## select-material package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [BasicDialogPopupComponent](./select-material.basicdialogpopupcomponent.md) | Basic dialog popup |
|  [DialogPopupComponent](./select-material.dialogpopupcomponent.md) | Component used for rendering basic popup with options |
|  [DialogPopupDirective](./select-material.dialogpopupdirective.md) | Directive that changes ng select popup to DialogPopup |
|  [NgSelectDialogPopupModule](./select-material.ngselectdialogpopupmodule.md) | Module allows using of angular material dialog for select popup |
|  [VirtualEditPopupComponent](./select-material.virtualeditpopupcomponent.md) | Component used for rendering virtual edit popup with options |
|  [VirtualEditPopupModule](./select-material.virtualeditpopupmodule.md) | Module for VirtualEditPopup components, can also by used for non edit version |
